Package org.ngi.zhighcharts

Interface Summary
ExtXYModel An extended XY chart data model. 1/ each series can have some options (styling or other) stored as a map 2/ each series xy point can also have some options data (styling or other) stored as a map
IntervalModel A interval chart data model.
 

Class Summary
ListWrappedIntervalModel A wrapped interval data model implementation of IntervalModel, which wrap on a ListModelList a list model list of Maps containing data.
ListWrappedXYModel An XY data model implementation of ExtXYModel, which wrap on a ListModelList a list model list of Maps containing data.
SimpleExtXYModel A extended XY data model implementation of ExtXYModel.
SimpleExtXYModel.XYPair  
SimpleIntervalModel A Band data model implementation of IntervalModel.
SimpleIntervalModel.Band  
Version  
ZGauge  
ZHighCharts this class is a wrapper component for Hichcharts JS library API doc ref see: http://www.highcharts.com/ref/ usage Javascript: http://www.highcharts.com/documentation/how-to-use it works with chart models (@link ChartModel) you can use several models (@link ExtXYModel) for plotting data in series you can use a chart model (@link IntervalModel) to plot band intervals or lines on X or Y axis
